---
title: Hackademy - Hacker Educational Content
publish_date: 2021-01-20 
readtime:
abstract: Hackademy is a rich learning resource tailored for anyone interested in diving into the tech world, especially in areas such as cybersecurity, computer science, privacy engineering, product design, product management, blockchain security, and ethics. With my background in cybersecurity and computer science, I've curated a rich array of resources to guide individuals at any stage of their tech journey.
---


If you're interested in learning about cybersecurity, computer science, privacy engineering, product design, product management, blockchain security and ethics then you've come to the right place. 


This collection of resources is packed full of useful information that can help guide you on your journey into tech. So whatever your level of experience may be, there's something here for everyone.

So what are you waiting for? Start exploring today!

## Quote

> “Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.” - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

***

## Fundamentals of Cybersecurity and Computer Science
- [**Intro to Cybersecurity**](https://www.usna.edu/Users/cs/wcbrown/courses/si110AY13S/lec/index.html)
- [**Intro to Computer Science**](https://web.stanford.edu/class/cs106e/) _Click on Lecture Notes_
- [**List of Free Python Resources**](https://hakin9.org/list-of-free-python-resources/)
- [**Python Guide**](https://cs.stanford.edu/people/nick/py/)
- [**Python for Cybersecurity**](https://python.cyberdefendersprogram.com/)
- [**Python Basics**](http://web.stanford.edu/class/cs106a/index.html#mainNav) _Click on Lectures_
- [**Python Tutorials**](https://docs.python.org/3.10/tutorial/)
- [**Introduction to the Command Line**](https://launchschool.com/books/command_line/read/introduction)
- [**Linux Basics**](https://practicalunix.org/)
- [**Intro to Git and GitHub**](https://launchschool.com/books/git/read/introduction)
- [**Eloquent JavaScript**](https://eloquentjavascript.net/)

- [**Web Attack Cheat Sheet**](https://github.com/riramar/Web-Attack-Cheat-Sheet)
- [**The Modern JavaScript Tutorial**](https://javascript.info/)
- [**How to Read Research Papers**](https://web.stanford.edu/class/ee384m/Handouts/HowtoReadPaper.pdf)

## Ethics, Privacy Engineering and The Law of Computer Technology
- [**ACM Code of Ethics and Professional Conduct**](https://www.acm.org/binaries/content/assets/about/acm-code-of-ethics-and-professional-conduct.pdf)
- [**Ethical OS Risk Mitigation Checklist**](https://ethicalos.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/EthicalOS_Check-List_080618.pdf)
- [**Letters to a Young Technologist**](https://letterstoayoungtechnologist.com/What-is-Technology)
- [**Feynman’s Error: On Ethical Thinking and Drifting**](https://www.danmunro.ca/blog/2018/11/29/feynmans-error-on-ethical-thinking-and-drifting-nbsp)
- [**With Great Tech Comes Great Responsibility by Mozilla Foundation (2020)**](https://assets.mofoprod.net/network/documents/Mozilla_Zine.pdf)
- [**A Contextual Approach to Privacy Online**](https://www.amacad.org/publication/contextual-approach-privacy-online)
- [**Privacy Overview by Judith DeCew**](https://plato.stanford.edu/entries/privacy/)
- [**Privacy as Contextual Integrity**](https://www.andrew.cmu.edu/user/danupam/RevnissenbaumDTP31.pdf)
- [**Privacy Harms**](https://scholarship.law.gwu.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=2790&context=faculty_publications)
- [**A Shortage of Privacy Engineers**](https://lorrie.cranor.org/pubs/priveng-march2013.pdf)
- [**Privacy Engineering 101**](https://courses.openmined.org/)
- [**The Privacy Engineer's Manifesto**](https://link.springer.com/content/pdf/10.1007%2F978-1-4302-6356-2.pdf)
- [**Privacy Engineering: Proactively Embedding Privacy, by Design**](https://www.ipc.on.ca/wp-content/uploads/resources/pbd-priv-engineering.pdf)
- [**A Video Course in Differential Privacy**](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmd_zeMNzSvRRNpoEWkVo6QY_6rR3SHjp)
- [**Differential Privacy: A Primer for a Non-Technical Audience**](https://privacytools.seas.harvard.edu/files/privacytools/files/differential_privacy_a_primer.pdf)
- [**The Promise of Differential Privacy A Tutorial on Algorithmic Techniques**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/PID2016981.pdf)
- [**Differential Privacy Whitepaper by Cynthia Dwork**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/dwork.pdf)
- [**No Free Lunch in Data Privacy**](http://www.cse.psu.edu/~duk17/papers/nflprivacy.pdf)
- [**A Taxonomy of Privacy**](https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=667622)
- [**XRay: Enhancing the Web’s Transparency with Differential Correlation**](https://www.usenix.org/system/files/conference/usenixsecurity14/sec14-paper-lecuyer.pdf)
- [**A Methodology for Information Flow Experiments**](https://www.andrew.cmu.edu/user/danupam/ife.pdf)
- [**Privacy and Contextual Integrity: Framework and Applications**](https://www.andrew.cmu.edu/user/danupam/bdmn-oakland06.pdf)
- [**Robust De-anonymization of Large Sparse Datasets**](https://www.cs.utexas.edu/~shmat/shmat_oak08netflix.pdf)
- [**The End of Trust from McSweeney’s and Electronic Frontier Foundation**](https://www.eff.org/document/end-trust-0)
- [**The Age of Surveillance Capitalism by Shoshana Zuboff**](https://stanford.app.box.com/s/3bq0f072zgb2p5db16ucb3kqrzrqj87e)
- [**A Design for Public Trustee and Privacy Protection Regulation**](https://scholarship.shu.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=1169&context=shlj)
- [**Glossary of Privacy Terms**](https://iapp.org/resources/glossary/)
- [**Comparing Privacy Laws: GDPR v. CCPA by Data Guidance and Future of Privacy Forum**](https://fpf.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/GDPR_CCPA_Comparison-Guide.pdf)
- [**General Data Protection Regulation (EU GDPR)**](https://gdpr-text.com/)
- [**Global Privacy Law and Data Protection Directory**](https://iapp.org/resources/global-privacy-directory/)
- [**Global Comprehensive Privacy Law Mapping Chart**](https://iapp.org/media/pdf/resource_center/global_comprehensive_privacy_law_mapping.pdf)
- [**A Researcher’s Guide to Some Legal Risks of Security Research**](https://clinic.cyber.harvard.edu/files/2020/10/Security_Researchers_Guide-2.pdf)
- [**Law of Computer Technology**](http://euro.ecom.cmu.edu/program/law/08-732/)
- [**Law for Computer Scientists**](https://www.cohubicol.com/assets/uploads/law_for_computer_scientists.pdf)
- [**Computational Law**](http://complaw.stanford.edu/complaw/public/lessons.php)

## Mathematics, Data Structures, and Algorithims
- [**Why Do We Study Calculus? by Professor Eric Schechter**](https://math.vanderbilt.edu/schectex/courses/whystudy.html)
- [**Elementary Calculus: An Infinitesimal Approach**](https://people.math.wisc.edu/~keisler/calc.html)
- [**Intro to Logic**](http://intrologic.stanford.edu/general/lessons.php)
- [**A Guide to Writing Mathematics by Dr. Kevin P. Lee**](https://web.cs.ucdavis.edu/~amenta/w10/writingman.pdf)
- [**Mathematical Foundations of Computing**](http://web.stanford.edu/class/cs103/lectures/00/)
- [**THE Most Common Errors in Undergraduate Mathematics**](https://math.vanderbilt.edu/schectex/commerrs/)
- [**How to Read and Do Proofs by Daniel Solow**](https://app.box.com/s/v7jo3nz5085blj8734krn8bkkdwbgr2y)
- [**Introduction to the Theory of Computation by Anil Maheshwari and Michiel Smid**](https://cglab.ca/~michiel/TheoryOfComputation/TheoryOfComputation.pdf)
- [**Understanding Pure Mathematics**](https://app.box.com/s/gwr3wc46495c50uk5l11wjtmz5a0t4nf)
- [**Mathematical Proofs**](https://app.box.com/s/xiftspzequqaqv8t8p8yu0n6q7it7xa1)
- [**Discrete Math**](https://web.stanford.edu/class/cs103/schedule.html)
- [**Data Structures**](http://web.stanford.edu/class/cs166/)
- [**Algorithms by Jeff Erickson Lecture Notes**](http://jeffe.cs.illinois.edu/teaching/algorithms/)
- [**Algorithms by Jeff Erickson Free Textbook**](http://jeffe.cs.illinois.edu/teaching/algorithms/book/Algorithms-JeffE.pdf)
- [**Tim Roughgarden Illuminated Lectures on Algrithims (Videos)**](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcH4Ga14Y4ELFKrEYM1vXCg/playlists)
- [**Design & Analysis of Algorithims Lecture Notes**](https://stanford cs161.github.io/winter2022/)
- [**Algorithms for Modern Hardware**](https://en.algorithmica.org/hpc/)
- [**Logic Programming**](http://logicprogramming.stanford.edu/stanford/applications.php)
- [**Physics and Mathematics Textbooks**](https://www.admissions.caltech.edu/documents/3234/Transfer_Entrance_Examinations_Book_List.pdf)
- [**The Feynman Lectures on Physics Audio Collection**](https://www.feynmanlectures.caltech.edu/flptapes.html)
- [**Learn Quantum Computation using Qiskit**](https://qiskit.org/textbook/preface.html)

- https://www.hacker101.com/resources (Hacking Tools & Resources)
- https://pwn.college/ (Hands-on Hacking Resources)
- https://academy.hackthebox.com/ (Hands-on Hacking Resources)
- https://picoctf.org/ (Hands-on Hacking Resources)
- https://ctf101.org/ (Hands-on Hacking Resources)
- https://courses.openmined.org/ (Privacy Engineering 101)
